name: full-stack-open-part3-submission
description: My course submission for Full Stack Open Part 3.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../Full\ Stack\ Open/Part\ 3/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../full-stack-open-part3-submission/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: nadelacruz
